action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The randy hill giant makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the randy hill giant, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the randy hill giant's turns.

If the randy hill giant takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the randy hill giant If the randy hill giant dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Vaccum
entries: The randy hill giant breathes in intensely, sucking in all creatures in a 100-feet cone. A creature in the cone at the start of the randy hill giants turn must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pulled 30-feet towards the randy hill giant. At the end of each of its turns, the randy hill giant decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

trait.name: Blubber
entries: When the randy hill giant takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage it reduces the damage taken by 3.
